ui.desc: The most sensible way to read your inner self
ui.viralSub: Scan QR code to start the test

items.text: I tend to want others to admire me and recognize my special status.
I tend to manipulate others to get my way when necessary.
I tend to be unconcerned with the morality of my actions.
I expect special favors from others because of who I am.
I have used deceit or social influence to get what I want.
I tend to be callous or insensitive to the needs of others.
I prefer to remain humble and don't need to be the center of attention.
I believe that honesty is the best policy, even if it slows down progress.
I am deeply moved by the emotions and hardships of others.
I aspire to hold a position of great power and influence.
I believe that the end justifies the means in competitive situations.
I enjoy taking risks even if they might have negative consequences.

N.high: You have high self-confidence and leadership potential.
N.low: You are modest and value collective success over personal glory.

M.high: You are a strategic thinker who excels at navigating complex social dynamics.
M.low: You value transparency and ethical integrity in all interactions.

P.high: You are emotionally resilient and can make tough decisions under pressure.
P.low: You are highly empathetic and value deep emotional connections.
